page.title: 15A day in the life of Joanna
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 8.00am, dress in my school uniform and then have a breakfast of toast and apple juice. I get ready for school, and at 8.40 am I walk to my school which is approximately l00 metres from my house. School starts at 9.00am so I spend a quarter of an hour in the playground. After registration we have assembly, with hymns, stories and prayers. Then I spend the morning doing Mathematics, English, and the Domesday Project. Lunch is at l2 noon, followed by playtime until l.00pm. Afternoon school consists of singing practice and creative activities followed by a story. At 3.00 pm the Infant Children go home and some of the Junior Class stay for after school activities. I stay for rounders and short tennis. At 3.45 pm I go home.
